```{r}
tablet <- readLines("practice.txt") %>%
  data_frame() %>%
  mutate(title = "tablet 1") 

colnames(tablet) <- c("text", "title")

tidy <- tablet %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text) %>%
  anti_join(stop_words)
```
```{r}
tidy %>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>%
  head(10)
```
